description.jp: パラメキア帝国の攻撃により 故郷のフィン王国を追われた青年。反乱軍のリーダーである王女ヒルダに助けられ その仲間に志願し 多くの戦いと別れを経て パラメキア皇帝に立ち向かった。反乱軍の合言葉「のばら」を大切に記憶している。
description.gl: A young man driven out of his homeland, Fynn, when it is attacked by the Empire of Palamecia. After being taken in by the rebel leader Princess Hilda, he decides to join their cause to exact vengeance upon the empire. He always keeps the rebel army's watchword "Wild Rose" close to his heart.

jp.text: ひとりで悩む必要なんかないさ
ともに力を合わせれば\n恐れるものなどない
野ばらの咲く世界が\n俺の夢なんだ
いいじゃないか タダだし！
レオンハルト…\nいつの日かきっと……！

gl.text: You shouldn't carry all that by yourself.
I am not just a tool.
And if we put that strength together、 we'll have nothing to fear.
My dream is a world filled with wild roses.
Leon... It will come true. Someday!

desc.en:
[Blood Weapon] use +2

When using [Blood Weapon]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 40%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• HP recovery effect becomes party-wide
• Increases HP recovery limit by 10%
• Excess HP recovered converted to BRV (limit 100% of INT BRV)
• Self: 6 turns [Blood Weapon] (20% [MAX BRV Up], 20% [ATK Up])

When HP is at least 50% of Max HP
• [Blood Weapon] becomes [Blood Weapon+]
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 30%
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets on last HP attack

While [Blood Weapon] is active and HP is at least 50% of Max HP
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+] 
　∟ Melee BRV attack
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 70% of Attack
　∟ Recovers HP by 30% of BRV damage dealt (limit 5% of Max HP)
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+] 
　∟ Increases own BRV by 70% of Attack
　∟ HP attack
　∟ Recovers HP by 30% of HP damage dealt (limit 5% of Max HP)
desc.gl:
Blood Weapon use +2

When using Blood Weapon:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • HP recovery effect extended to party
 • Slight increase to HP recovery limit
 • HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
 • 6 turns Blood Weapon buff

While HP at least 50% of MAX:
• Blood Weapon becomes Blood Weapon+ (4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack becomes 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; deals 50% of cumulative HP damage to non-targets on last HP attack)

While Blood Weapon buff active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (slight BRV damage boost; increases BRV based on own ATK; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK; HP attack; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)

desc.gl:
Blood Weapon use +2

When using Blood Weapon:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • HP recovery effect extended to party
 • Slight increase to HP recovery limit
 • HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
 • 6 turns Blood Weapon buff

While HP at least 50% of MAX:
• Blood Weapon becomes Blood Weapon+ (4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack becomes 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; deals 50% of cumulative HP damage to non-targets on last HP attack)

While Blood Weapon buff active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (slight BRV damage boost; increases BRV based on own ATK; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK; HP attack; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
